channel.title: Cant edit client?
channel.description:
Well i got a new server (megascape based, which is ts, which is cheezscape based) and i ccan edit most of the files, i edit item values and they change, i edit which monsters spawn where and it works. I USED to be able to change things in the client aswell, e.g. changing "Welcome to Megascape" and adding more commands and so forth. However, now whenever i try to change anything in the client, the document itself stays changed but when i open up the game client and start playing, nothing happens. An example: I made a new command called Tprunes, that simply gave you runes for teleporting without all the combat stuff at the same time. I went in the game and tried to use it and nothing happened... I was curious so i then went and changed the amount of runes you obtained from the original cbrunes spell from 1000k to 250k. I go into the game and type ::cbrunes and i still get 1000k runes from it. Now, i dont know when i stopped being able to use this because i havent played the game in a few weeks and only noticed now, however i believe it may have occured when i bought a new computer and installed it, i had to re-install the jdk, jre files and mopar etc etc.
Anybody have any idea whats happened and how i can fix it?
Jekkyl[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 09:07:00 AM[/size][hr]anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 09:19:57 AM[/size][hr] :confused: :mad:

item.title: Cant edit client?
item.dc:creator: @MasterZer0 MasterZer0
item.description:
@MasterZer0 wrote:

The same dang thing happens to me I can’t even update menu… I have a source but it just won’t update!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Cant edit client?
item.dc:creator: @dr_jekyll dr jekyll
item.description:
@dr_jekyll wrote:

Well i got a new server (megascape based, which is ts, which is cheezscape based) and i ccan edit most of the files, i edit item values and they change, i edit which monsters spawn where and it works. I USED to be able to change things in the client aswell, e.g. changing “Welcome to Megascape” and adding more commands and so forth. However, now whenever i try to change anything in the client, the document itself stays changed but when i open up the game client and start playing, nothing happens. An example:
I made a new command called Tprunes, that simply gave you runes for teleporting without all the combat stuff at the same time. I went in the game and tried to use it and nothing happened… I was curious so i then went and changed the amount of runes you obtained from the original cbrunes spell from 1000k to 250k. I go into the game and type ::cbrunes and i still get 1000k runes from it.
Now, i dont know when i stopped being able to use this because i havent played the game in a few weeks and only noticed now, however i believe it may have occured when i bought a new computer and installed it, i had to re-install the jdk, jre files and mopar etc etc.

Anybody have any idea whats happened and how i can fix it?
